pages.text: $(thing)Ethereal Mimics$() are a block that can easily take on the appearance of any other, while being completely intangible. These can make them quite handy for concealing pitfall traps and secret entrances. Keep your eye out and you may find these in the $(l:bloodmagic:dungeons/endless_realm)Endless Realm$().
Simply right-click the placed mimic with any other block to encourage it to take on its form.
